mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Harriet Lane to Charles Macalester, July 7, 1862
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnston, Harriet Lane, 1830-1903
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Harriet Lane at Wheatland to Charles Macalester concerning the return of Lily Macalester Berghmans to Philadelphia and a future visit with her. It is unclear if the letter is addressed to Lily Berghmanâ€™s father or brother, as both were named Charles Macalester.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Papers of Lily Macalester Berghmans Laughton
